Topic.Title: Each Glimpse A Mirror - a short game about the paths not taken - feedback welcome!

Posts.EditableText:
I just released Each Glimpse A Mirror on itch.io (for free), and would welcome any feedback!

Here's the description:

"It was hard to say how long you spent entangled with them - this spectre that entered your life unannounced. 

Your sense of time became warped. One thing stretched into another, until you could not see the joins at all." 

A short narrative game about the paths not taken.

And here's the link:

https://thejst.itch.io/each-glimpse-a-mirror

Thanks,

Jack
